_sText:
Attempt number 2 =)


Map Made in the style of the game "Portal" =)
On the map given by 6 levels. Levels are very easy and small =)
If a team completes all levels, it will taunt opponents. =)

At fpsbanana.com I've seen a few maps with textures and models and thought that it is allowed.

I beg to approve the map! =)

Evening - Special thanks for the video =)
